thread.title: BRIEF-Delphi Technologies Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-GAAP EPS $1.30

title: BRIEF-Delphi Technologies Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-GAAP EPS $1.30
text:
May 9, 2018 / 10:42 AM / in 13 minutes BRIEF-Delphi Technologies Reports Q1 Adjusted Non-GAAP EPS $1.30 Reuters Staff
May 9 (Reuters) - Delphi Technologies PLC:
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES REPORTS STRONG FIRST QUARTER 2018 FINANCIAL RESULTS, RAISES FULL YEAR OUTLOOK
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC Q1 REVENUE $1.3 BLN VS I/B/E/S VIEW $1.24 BLN
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC Q1 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP SHR $1.30 * DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC Q1 GAAP SHR $1.10
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC SEES FY REVENUE $5.0 BLN TO $5.2 BLN
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC Q1 SHR VIEW $1.15 — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC SEES FY ADJUSTED SHR $4.65 TO $4.95
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC FY2018 SHR VIEW $4.82, REV VIEW $5.08 BLN — THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S
* DELPHI TECHNOLOGIES PLC SEES 2018 CAPITAL EXPENDITURES $280 MLN - $300 MLN Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
